b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout,body#layout div.section{font-family:Arial,sans-serif}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content{background-color:#fff}body#layout .add_widget a{margin-left:0;font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.6)!important}body#layout .widget-content{padding:12px}body#layout div.section{background:transparent;margin:0 0 15px 0;padding:0;border:0}body#layout div.layout-title{font-size:14px}body#layout:before{content:"BMB - Temabanua";position:absolute;top:20px;left:25px;border-radius:4px;z-index:1;padding:10px 20px;font-size:18px;color:#fff;background:#2ecc71;border:1px solid #213243!important}body#layout #menu-bottom-wrapper h4,body#layout #temabanua-trend h4{display:none}body#layout #temabanua-trend>div{margin-top:0!important}body#layout{position:relative;padding:87px 25px 0 25px;max-width:920px;margin:0 auto!important;background-color:#2c3e50!important;border:1px solid #213243!important}body#layout .visibility .editlink{background:#2ecc71 url(https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgx-lH3scoDmJHRpA8bdLQl4QWZj3MvuKOra82ekfJ9QEgGbdxYnLFoLdwQTFFlZwhDdAtS5MygsdMAbT_KmevfXnKQx2-hjzHZUISn63LQaBYul_NeGTP7JyEghJv1JEz6xh680Cgb68c/s18-c/mode_edit_w600_24dp.png) no-repeat center!important;padding:0;margin:0;border-radius:2px}body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{background:#2ecc71 url(https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEiFjnFHxCqsk1xf7izzsfKFiF0pHQ5-WaMd9fjD-Ec4KYOOxbmQ-GA9RdriBNJzKa2pXjtwOZ2dDpAXzfKM5iRfysMhq04M0-jN6qoXYngGLKLQJHKmhq_-OG04RBdtoXueQzLP8fSynfA/s22/draggable.png) no-repeat 4px 50%!important}body#layout #temabanua__sidebar,body#layout #temabanua-logo {width:32%;float:left}body#layout #temabanua__content,body#layout #temabanua__search,body#layout #temabanua-widget {float:right;width:66%}body#layout #temabanua__footer,body#layout #temabanua__navigasi {display:inline-block;float:left;width:100%}body#layout .Blog:before,body#layout:after{padding:5px 10px;display:block;color:#fff;font-size:12px;background:#2ecc71;position:relative;border:1px solid #213243!important;margin:0 0 15px}body#layout .Blog:before{content:"Post Blog Area";margin-bottom:8px}body#layout:after{content:"Template Blogger by Temabanua";visibility:visible}body#layout #sidebar h4:after{content:" - Main Menu Link"}body#layout #header h4:after{content:" - Logo"}body#layout #main-logo h4,body#layout #main-menu h4,body#layout #menu-mobile h4,body#layout .layout-widget-description{font-size:12px!important}body#layout .section h4{padding:8px 10px;display:block;font-size:12px;color:#fff;background:#34495e;border:1px solid #455668;font-weight:400;margin:0;opacity:.8;line-height:8px}

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=650, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=450, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "temabanua-main-before-ad"))
b:section.name: Main Ads Post (Before)

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Responsive Advertisement

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "temabanua-main-after-ad"))
b:section.name: Main Ads Post (After)

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Responsive Advertisement
